content:
Since the beginning of a large -scale invasion in Kiev, there have been exactly 1000 air alarm.

About thisinformsKyiv City Military Administration.

The total duration of air alarm in the capital is1165 hours and 26 minutes.

“It is more than 48 days of continuous anxiety ... For more than a month and a half in shelters. We have tempered. We have become stronger. We will win!" - said the Chief of the KMVA Sergey Popko.

As reportedArmyinform, almost 17,000 crimes against national security are documented in Ukraine.
title: Kiev crossed a mark of 1000 air alarm since the beginning of a large -scale invasion
description: About it reports the Kyiv City Military Administration. Total duration ...
author: Army Inform
